Syntax Description allow-hint no allow-hint To allow the server to delegate a valid client-suggested prefix in the solicit and request messages, use the allow-hint command in Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) IPv6 interface server configuration mode. By default, the DHCP IPv4 Relay always broadcasts BOOTREPLY packets.
